K12Xbsu017_u:9: tasmai namaskṛtvā idamāryāvalokiteśvaramukhodgīrṇaṃ vajradharamahīyaṃ hayagrīvaṃ nāma paramahṛdayamāvartayiṣyāmisarvakarmārthasādhakam /
K12Xbsu017_u:11: amoghaṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ viṣāṇāṃ ca nāśakam / tadyathā
K12Xbsu017_u:12: om tarula tarula vitarula vitarula sarvaviṣaghātaka jvalitavisphuliṅgāṭṭahāsa kesarāṭopapravṛddhavega
K12Xbsu017_u:15: paramaśāntikarasarvagrahapraśamanakara budhya budhya dhāva dhāva ca bhagavā hayagrīva
K12Xbsu017_u:17: rakṣa rakṣa kṣamasva kṣamasva sa mayābhihitāṃ mantrām /
K12Xbsu017_u:19: ghorapiśāca sarvagraheṣvapratihato mama varavajradaṃṣṭra kiṃ cirāpayasi /
K12Xbsu017_u:20: idaṃ duṣṭagrahaṃ duṣṭasattvaṃ duṣṭapiśācaṃ vā dhuna dhuna vidhuna vidhuna kampa kampa matha matha pramatha pramatha /
K12Xbsu017_u:21: tathāgatājñāṃ pālaya buddhadharmasaṃghānujñātaṃ me karma śīghraṃ (Hgv 44)
K12Xbsu017_u:23: hayagrīvāya phaṭ vajrakhurāya phaṭ vajradaṃṣṭrāya phaṭ vajradaṃṣṭrotkaṭabhayabhairavāya phaṭ /
K12Xbsu017_u:31: yāvanto mamaye kecitahitaiṣiṇastān sarvān vaḍavāmukhena nikṛntaya phaṭ /
K12Xbsu017_u:33: sidhyantu mama maṃtrapadā hayagrīvo bhagavān ājñāpayati svāhā /
K12Xbsu017_u:34: ayaṃ hayagrīvavidyā rājā paṭhitasiddhaḥ upacāraḥ ātmarakṣājāpena pararakṣā paṃcaraṃgīsūtram ekaviṃśatigranthayaḥ kṛtvā bandhitavyam /
K12Xbsu017_u:37: sarvaparakṛtā maṃtrāśchinnā bhavanti sarvaśatravastambhanaṃ manasā vyavahāre svakham mukhe kṛtvā vidyā japtayā uttarāyati /
K12Xbsu017_u:38: spṛṣṭāveśaneṣusnātaṃ śucivastraprāvṛtaṃ śucau pradeśe sumanasāsaṃbaddhā āveśaye śuklavaliryathālaṃbhena /
K12Xbsu017_u:39: candragrahe sūryagrahe ghṛtaṃ tāmrabhājane kṛtvā tāvajjepadyāvaccandro mukto bhavati taṃ ghṛtaṃ pive medhāvī bhavati ekenoddeśena ślokaśatamudgṛṇhāti
K12Xbsu017_u:52: bhasmanā sarṣapeṇa udakena sapta japtena rakṣā kartavyā /
